电子科技大学网络空间安全研究院描述: The Institute for Cyber Security of the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China is one of the earliest institutes in China to systematically carry out research on computer systems and cyber security. It innovatively puts forward an Active Cyber-security Model with "Intelligence", "Analysis" and "Liveliness" as its core elements, and continues to carry out basic and pioneering exploration and practice in this field.. It has taken the lead in winning the first prize for the National Science and Technology Progress Award in 2019 and the second prize for the National Science and Technology Progress Award in 2012. It was the 3-time winner of the first prize for provincial and ministerial Science and Technology Progress Award and 2-time winner of the first prize for provincial and ministerial Technological Invention. It was selected as the outstanding achievement of projects supported by the 13th Five-Year Plan National Natural Science Foundation. 400 high-level academic papers and many books have been published. CDSL-YAK is the first domestic open-source domain-specific language in the field of cyber security, which was initiated by the core members of "Cohesion Studio" founded by the Institute for Cyber Security and has developed for many years.
四维创智（北京）科技发展有限公司，公司品牌名称万径安全，成立于2013年，公司以: Siwei Chuangzhi (Beijing) Technology Development Co., Ltd. operates under the brand name MegaVector. Founded in 2013, the company is committed to its mission of "Making the world safer, making security simpler", striving to provide users with comprehensive, efficient, and secure cybersecurity solutions.With "AI + YAK" as its core corporate strategy, the company focuses on cybersecurity infrastructure and intelligent technology research. It has pioneered YAK, the first domestically developed cybersecurity development environment, and WanJing QianJi, an advanced AI security agent, both of which are internationally and domestically innovative. Based on YAK, the company has built an autonomous and controllable cybersecurity ecosystem, driving the integration and development of the security industry. Its self-developed products have been widely applied across industries such as energy, finance, and telecommunications.
YAK是国内外首创的全国产化网络安全领域开发环境。2023年，YAK入选工信部信: YAK is the first domestically developed cybersecurity development environment. In 2023, it was recognized as one of the Top Ten Technological Advances in the Information and Communications Field by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology (MIIT). In 2024, the YAK textbook "CDSL-YAK: Cybersecurity Programming Language—From Introduction to Practice" was officially published. In 2024 and 2025, YAK was evaluated by nine academicians as an internationally pioneering, internationally advanced, and domestically leading technology with completely independent intellectual property rights.
Yak教材《CDSL-YAK网络安全领域编程语言-从入门到实践》: The YAK textbook "CDSL-YAK: Cybersecurity Programming Language – From Introduction to Practice".
